description: Tableau-building Civilization game for 2
Perfect 2-player version of an already great game.
Thanks to sugar mama C. Hwang!
Includes Pantheon expansion

title: A wonderfu...
description: A wonderful game - my girlfriend and I play this with some regularity after a long day of work. Suffers from an annoying "maintenance phase" that's also found in games like Castles of Burgundy and Azul, but that's not even remotely worth considering given how absolutely awesome this game is.

title: not nearly...
description: not nearly as good as the full game. I don't like the constant step of discarding.

title: We like th...
description: We like that it is slightly “nasty”, the take that is fine in a two player game. Nice how it keeps the 7Wonders essence and adds some very cool things to make. A great two player game. We have been playing this more than the full normal game.Maybe some of these ideas could be developed by expansions to the normal game?

title: Now I get ...
description: Now I get the positive reviews. This game is really a well done version of 7 wonders for 2 players.

title: Weight: 2....
description: Weight: 2.23 / 5

title: 2 players,...
description: 2 players, 30-45 minutes, medium heavy, card drafting.Rating based on run through and 1st plays. After 2 more plays, upgraded to 8.0. After 5 games, upgraded to 8.5. This game is really good and as a two player game better than it's big brother. Still hesitant to purchase the expansion, which is quite expensive (almost the base game) and as we don't play it that often, there's probably no need for the expansion as the base game is very good as it is.

title: Great 2 pl...
description: Great 2 player game, a little randomness, but strong back and forth counter-play that gets better the more plays with the same person

title: This is a ...
description: This is a good game that feels like a distant relative to 7 Wonders.The semi hidden draft mechanic works really well.

title: My wife li...
description: My wife likes to play, so it gets extra points.  But generally good two-player game for things like a bar night or a lunch hour.

title: Quick & ea...
description: Quick & easy to set up. Many fun choices. Multiple paths to victory. Plays quick as well.

title: 2 player s...
description: 2 player spectacular !

title: By far, My...
description: By far, My favorite 2 player casual board game.  I love that it gives me the feeling of 7 wonders, but with 2 people.  the idea of having blind card that you don't know what's coming up and what you could potentially flip over for your opponent is awesome.  It's just such a fun game that is great and really makes you think.

title: Only playe...
description: Only played once, so will try it again, but the game I played was heavily imbalanced. The other player didn't stand a chance. Seems like luck can be against you in this though, which isn't ideal.

title: Perfect 2 ...
description: Perfect 2 player game!  Most of my gaming is 2 player with a close friend and we play a lot of different things.  This game makes it to the table nearly every session. Many possible paths to victory and you have to watch what your opponent is doing.  We have had several games come down to the last couple of cards.

title: A very nic...
description: A very nice two-player implementation of 7 Wonders. It always makes me want to play its big brother though.

title: Fun though...
description:
Fun though felt very lucky on my first play through. Looking forward to trying again.

Got rid of just because my wife and I prefferr some other two players.

title: Easy to te...
description: Easy to teach, quick to play. It's a fantastic tug-o-war. It does have some chess-like qualities in that the better player is most likely thinking many turns ahead while factoring in when a 2nd turn wonder may be built as well. Definitely my favorite 2 player only game!

title: [b][size=1...
description: [b][size=12][BGCOLOR=#C0C0C0]Sleeved[/BGCOLOR][/size][/b]
